name: HEX code detection shorter var
description: Another HEX code detection variants + issue
content:
Detects if a string is a hex color code (length 3 or 6).
Extremely short, but works perfectly!
W/ #:
 6: #00ffff
 3: #F0a
W/O #:
 6: 0a4379
 3: 0ad

Other ISSUE samples:
0ada 0adbc 0adbcfa 0adbcfbc...


By htmlguy - htmlguy.cu.cc

Marche tout aussi bien :
/#?(([a-f\d]{3}){1,2})/ig
(= version sans la notion de 'non capturing group')
=> Encore plus "short"...!

ISSUE :
